code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import image from'../../images/book1.jpg';import{removeBookItem,addBookItem,decreaseCartItemQuantity}from'../../redux/actions/cart.actions';import'./CheckoutItem.scss';var checkoutItem=function checkoutItem(_ref){var bookItem=_ref.bookItem,removeBookFromCart=_ref.removeBookFromCart,increaseQuantity=_ref.increaseQuantity,decreaseQuantity=_ref.decreaseQuantity;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"checkout-item"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"image-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:image,alt:"item"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"title"},bookItem.title),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"quantity"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"arrow",role:"presentation",onClick:function onClick(){return decreaseQuantity(bookItem);}},"\u276E"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"value"},bookItem.quantity),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"arrow",role:"presentation",onClick:function onClick(){return increaseQuantity(bookItem);}},"\u276F")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"price"},bookItem.price),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"remove-button",role:"presentation",onClick:function onClick(){return removeBookFromCart(bookItem);}},"\u2715"));};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{removeBookFromCart:function removeBookFromCart(item){return dispatch(removeBookItem(item));},increaseQuantity:function increaseQuantity(item){return dispatch(addBookItem(item));},decreaseQuantity:function decreaseQuantity(item){return dispatch(decreaseCartItemQuantity(item));}};};export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(checkoutItem);
